roleset.name: safe
roleset.note: SAFE-J NOTES: Reframed by Julia based on BOLT-1, safeguard-v.01, dangerous.01. (from safe.01-j)
SAFEST-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from safest.01-j)
SAFER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from safer.01-j)

role.descr: activity, thing that is not dangerous

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: You are safe to drink this.

example.name: arg0, concatenated
example.text: The Listeriosis is gone and the meat is safe to eat.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: An aircraft inspector plays an important role in ensuring that airplanes are safe for all.

example.name: lexical comparative
example.text: Thus , no matter which way you look at it , a democratic world is beneficial and innocuous for Americans . Besides selling goods , it 's also safer .
